name: rr272x-dkms
tagline: Debian package which adds the "open-source" rr272x driver as dkms module
body:
### rr272x-dkms 
This is the packaging for the HighPoint RocketRaid 2710-2722 models.
The original driver can be obtained on the [HighPoint website](http://www.highpoint-tech.com/USA_new/CS-PCI-E_2_0_x8_Configuration.html). **The driver only works up to Linux 3.8.4 for now.**

The only part of the driver which is actually open-source is the kernel interface. Everything else is just blobs.
So it can't really be considered OSS and it's unlikely that it will ever be included in the debian package tree.
Here is a package repo for the driver. In case there will ever be updates I'll update that one too.

```
wget -O - http://p.l42.at/signing-pub.key | sudo apt-key add -
echo "deb http://p.l42.at/debian wheezy main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/rr272x.list
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install rr272x-dkms
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
